overview:
## Discussion

Use these constants with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/representationOfImageReps(in:using:properties:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/representation(using:properties:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/setPixel(_:atX:y:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/value(forProperty:)].

When using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/value(forProperty:)] method to retrieve the the value for any of these keys, be sure to check that the returned value is non-`nil` before you attempt to use it. A bitmap image representation may return `nil` for any values that have not yet been set.

# NSBitmapImageRep.PropertyKey

**Structure**

Constants that identify bitmap image representation properties.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PropertyKey
```

## Discussion

Use these constants with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/representationOfImageReps(in:using:properties:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/representation(using:properties:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/setPixel(_:atX:y:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/value(forProperty:)].

When using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBitmapImageRep/value(forProperty:)] method to retrieve the the value for any of these keys, be sure to check that the returned value is non-`nil` before you attempt to use it. A bitmap image representation may return `nil` for any values that have not yet been set.

## Bitmap Properties

- **colorSyncProfileData**: Identifies an `NSData` object containing the ColorSync profile data.
- **compressionFactor**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing the compression factor of the image.
- **compressionMethod**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object identifying the compression method of the image.
- **currentFrame**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing the current frame for an animated GIF file.
- **currentFrameDuration**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing the duration (in seconds) of the current frame for an animated GIF image.
- **ditherTransparency**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing a Boolean that indicates whether the image is dithered.
- **exifData**: Identifies an `NSDictionary` object containing the EXIF data for the image.
- **fallbackBackgroundColor**: Specifies the background color to use when writing to an image format (such as JPEG) that doesn’t support alpha.
- **frameCount**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing the number of frames in an animated GIF file.
- **gamma**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing the gamma value for the image.
- **interlaced**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing a Boolean value that indicates whether the image is interlaced.
- **loopCount**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing the number of loops to make when animating a GIF image.
- **progressive**: Identifies an `NSNumber` object containing a Boolean that indicates whether the image uses progressive encoding.
- **rgbColorTable**: Identifies an `NSData` object containing the RGB color table.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**
- **init(rawValue:)**

## Type Properties

- **imageIPTCData**
- **imageIPTCData**

## Managing Compression Types

- **getTIFFCompressionTypes(_:count:)**: Returns by indirection an array of all available compression types that can be used when writing a TIFF image.
- **localizedName(forTIFFCompressionType:)**: Returns an autoreleased string containing the localized name for the specified compression type.
- **canBeCompressed(using:)**: Tests whether the bitmap image representation can be compressed by the specified compression scheme.
- **setCompression(_:factor:)**: Sets the bitmap image representation’s compression type and compression factor.
- **getCompression(_:factor:)**: Returns by indirection the bitmap image representation’s compression type and compression factor.
- **setProperty(_:withValue:)**: Sets the specified property of the bitmap image representation to the specified value.
- **value(forProperty:)**: Returns the value for the specified property.
- **NSBitmapImageRep.TIFFCompression**: Constants that represent the supported TIFF data-compression schemes.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
